values.value:
An optional array of save methods to display when configuring the field LoggerSettings__c.DefaultSaveMethod__c in the LWC loggerSettings. When not configured, the enum values of Logger.SaveMethod are used instead.
This can be used in two possible ways: 1. Disable/hide save methods - if there are any save methods that you do not want to be selectable in your org, you can provide a subset of values. 2. Add new save methods - if you are building a plugin, you may want to include new save methods. Orgs that are you using your plugin can configure this parameter to include your additional save method(s).
